user.title: Configure Otodata Tank Monitor
user.description:
Enter your Nee-Vo portal credentials. The Nee-Vo portal (by Otodata Network) is used to access your Otodata tank monitor data.

**Setting up your Nee-Vo portal account:**
1. Download the Nee-Vo app: [iOS]({ios_app}) | [Android]({android_app})
2. Create an account or sign in
3. Scan the QR code or enter the alpha-numeric code from your Otodata tank monitor device
4. Register as the home owner (you can register even if you don't own the tank monitor)
5. Use those same Nee-Vo credentials here

**Optional: Propane Pricing**
You can also add a URL to track propane prices in your area from the EIA website. Examples:
- North Carolina: https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/pet_pri_wfr_dcus_snc_w.htm
- Connecticut: https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/pet_pri_wfr_dcus_SCT_w.htm
- Ohio: https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/pet_pri_wfr_dcus_SOH_w.htm

Find your state's URL at: https://www.eia.gov/dnav/pet/pet_pri_wfr_a_EPM0_PRS_dpgal_w.htm
